amendment.description: To expand the business size restrictions of the Rural Business Enterprise Grant Program for Oakridge, OR.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2127 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2127 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14142) To expand the business size restrictions of the Rural Business Enterprise Grant Program for Oakridge, OR.
